mapper.insert: insert into T_WM_CUST_ADDRESS (F_ID, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, PHONE, POST, REMARK, CUST_ID, DEFAULT_ADDRESS, CONSIGNEE_PERSON, CUST_VALID) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consigneePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custValid,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update T_WM_CUST_ADDRESS set PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, POST = #{post,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEFAULT_ADDRESS = #{defaultAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONSIGNEE_PERSON = #{consigneePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_VALID = #{custValid,jdbcType=INTEGER} where F_ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select F_ID, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, PHONE, POST, REMARK, CUST_ID, DEFAULT_ADDRESS, CONSIGNEE_PERSON, CUST_VALID from T_WM_CUST_ADDRESS where F_ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select F_ID, PROVINCE, CITY, ADDRESS, PHONE, POST, REMARK, CUST_ID, DEFAULT_ADDRESS, CONSIGNEE_PERSON, CUST_VALID from T_WM_CUST_ADDRESS
